message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal life. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $11,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring you receive a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration.

Alice, thanks for the detailed introduction to the product. I see the value, but I'm working with a tighter budget. Would you consider $9,000? This price point would allow me to move forward comfortably.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After considering your offer, I believe we can find common ground. I am willing to negotiate further. For your convenience, I am proposing a price of $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value of our offering.
Alice, I appreciate you being willing to work with me on the price.  To be honest, $9,200 is the highest I can go. If that works, I'm ready to close the deal.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm glad we're able to continue discussing this. In light of your offer, I propose a price of $9,300 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions, allowing you to secure the product within your budget while still recognizing its true value.
